import { useEffect, useState } from "react" export const StudentForm = ({ user }) => { const [studentForm, setStudentForm] = useState({}) const handleInput = (event) => { const copy = { ...studentForm } const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value copy[name] = value setStudentForm(copy) console.log("copy", copy) } useEffect(() => { }, []) return (
